snippet: Carl Edwards claimed a rain-soaked win Sunday at Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee, where weather wreaked havoc on yet another Nascar Sprint Cup race this season.
abstract: Carl Edwards wins Nascar Sprint Cup race at Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards claimed a rain-soaked win Sunday at Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee, where weather wreaked havoc on yet another Nascar Sprint Cup race this season.
